name: Whonghorn (Jam Edition)
description:
Enter Labrinthia, a dangerous, neon-soaked, dungeon-like planet that randomly adjusts every time you enter it!

Are you Courageous enough to battle your way through the ever-shifting planet and strike down Whonghorn, the evil-being that has inhabited it?

FIGHT: Move your mouse to rotate your sword and slash enemies!

RANDOMLY GENERATED: The otherworldly planet Labrinthia re-adjusts itself every time you enter it!

UPGRADE: Earn coins and use them to buy upgrades! They both stick throughout every generation of Labrinthia.

-----------------------------------------

PLEASE NOTE:

Due to saving reasons, this game cannot be played in a web browser I believe, sorry for the inconvenience!

There is a Fast Mode option in the bottom-left corner that turns off post-processing for lower-end pcs.

The song is available to download on the downloads page if you want!
